website_summaries.verdict: This exceedingly popular model offers users supreme fitness tracking at an low price.
pros: Helpful inserts offer insight with included health charts and diagrams
A small food log section included with each daily fitness tracking page
cons: Cardio and strength logs are both divided into 2 smaller sections on the same page

customer_reviews.title: Well made. Just need more room to describe exercises.
customer_reviews.text: It is okay. It has all you need in it. I find, however, for someone who is always adding new exercises to my workout and needs to jot down an explanation, there is just not enough room. Sometimes my workouts have a lot of exercises and there is just not room to use 2 lines for each one.
customer_reviews.author: Rocketgirl

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It has so much
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It has so much! It makes you want to stay with it because it keeps you so involved!
customer_reviews.author: Kaleigh Goethe

customer_reviews.title: Journal Great...but Copyright Date/Edition is Misrepresented
customer_reviews.text: I've used this journal for many years. I've tried others, but I continue to come back to this one because its layout is clear and concise. The only issue I have is that I have tried to purchase the most current version (the website says its copyright is 2007-there's one that's copyrighted 2011) twice and while it's advertised what I receive is copyrighted 2002 and doesn't have updated information that 14 (almost 15) years would bring. It's very disappointing because I'd really like to have the more current edition. If you've looked around and are looking for this to be the current edition, you won't receive it.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi Campbell

customer_reviews.title: The best out there!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this journal. It has your nutrition and exercise all in one, visible place. Really hard not to be accountable for your efforts when you have to look at the whole picture. In a digital era, I still need to WRITE things down to see them and feel the impact and this does exactly that.Lots of areas to plan for the bigger picture, several weeks in advance as well as track your overall progress. As a woman, I have never really focused on my measurements, but this has really gotten me intrigued and more involved in those details. I would highly recommend this book to anyone, man or woman!
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Put together well, but not large enough for my vision.
customer_reviews.text: Ah, I found that it was too small to write in unless you are able to read small print. If the book was lager with more space to allow for larger writting without squeezing it onto a small page, I'd of given it a higher star rating. It's perfectly fine if you can write small, but my vision does not allow me to write small enough and then be able to read it. I'm sure if you have good vision, this product will work just fine for yourself.
customer_reviews.author: minktoy

customer_reviews.title: OK... AS LONG AS YOU DON’T DO FIVE SETS OF ANYTHING
customer_reviews.text: It’s OK... especially if you are just tracking basic info about your workout, but also do lots of different things and or want to also track basic nutrition. HOWEVER, -not much room to describe individual exercises, and the deal breaker for me, can’t do five sets of an exercise. I’m flummoxed. Five by five is one of the absolute most basic and common rep schemes... and this book can’t handle it.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Very detailed along with good instructional tips for use.
customer_reviews.text: great workout and exercise journal, has section for workout chart for cardio, strength training, other exercises, dietary notes, water, vitamins, supplements, only lacks more space for just notes in the daily log, rear of book does have a section to track stats on a daily basis.. and a single plastic sleeve attached for storing a loose page, receipts, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Keeps All the Data
customer_reviews.text: I really like this journal. I am on my second one. I used to just use a composition notebook, but I like this better. There are places for all types of exercises. There is a place for cardio equipment with the time, cal, etc. There is a place for exercises like weightlifting. There is another place for alternate exercises, like Pilates and Yoga. In addition to that, there is room to keep track of food. It's a winner for me.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I like the way each page included particular cardio machines and ...
customer_reviews.text: I am currently on my second copy of this journal. I like the way each page included particular cardio machines and then gives additional space for cardio workouts. I then move on to the area for strength training. That area includes space for muscle group worked, what exercise was done and how many sets/reps. The facing page lists dietary notes for each meal and snack. It's a very handy book to have.
customer_reviews.author: Jane A.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect need for any bodybuilder, bikini, physique & figure Competitors who wants to keep an amazing journal - Contest Prep
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a workout, Diet & Exercise journal book that works wonder. First, I love how it breaks down a lot of food macros. As a Figure Competitor, I calculate all my macros during contest prep to ensure I eat enough. Those pages help out because it has help me expand more protein choices...as long as I am still within my macros number. Second, I eat 6 meals a day and it contains enough space for you to write/log all 6 meals because it contains: Breakfast, snack, lunch, snack, dinner & Snack. All and all, this book is probably one of the best workout log journal I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Compulsive Organization
customer_reviews.text: I love this notebook to track my fitness workouts, my meals and my individual successes. This handy notebook is perfect. It allows you to track your daily progress, log trends and monitor your growth over time. Very handy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: P. Olson

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy/dingy
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this three stars because of the quality. It's very flimsy, and the pages are dingy and have a weird finish to them that makes it hard to write on in pencil. The spiral binding is also not very sturdy. Also, the format of the journal did not work for me, but that is obviously a matter of personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect journal for gym
customer_reviews.text: I received this product and I was pretty impressed. I had a bad experience with the quality of the Gympad, so I with this journal. This cover and back are made of a leatherlike material and appears durable. The pages are of good weight. This journal has awesome features. You can provide weekly measurements of your body, write down your daily content on cardio/weights/vitamins/water consumption. The journal is perfect companion to any phone app and if not better. Very pleased with this purchase and will likely purchase again after completing the 12 weeks of this journal.
customer_reviews.author: Matt E.

customer_reviews.title: But if you want to log a year's worth - like most journals track - skip this
customer_reviews.text: If you only need to track your workouts for 13 weeks or so, then this is for you. But if you want to log a year's worth - like most journals track - skip this. I should have read the fine print more closely. Every other workout or running log I've ever purchased was for 1 YEAR. I'll be using the pages of this as fire starters and buy something else more useful-or just keep my digital records. UGGH.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Great Journal for Fitness and/or Diet
customer_reviews.text: This journal has made tracking my fitness and dietary goals much easier to reach - at least the organizational aspect! The folks at Bodyminder built the journal around the user's needs, i.e. almost every unit or function you might want to track has been built into the journal - and for those units that aren't called out specifically, there two areas for notes and sufficient room for write-ins, e.g. additional cardio exercises. The journal is well built, comes with some handy extras (dietary breakdown of common foods for easy reference), and for the price it's the best tool I've used. Now I just have to go to the gym...
customer_reviews.author: Marc Speed

customer_reviews.title: Excellent journal for exercise and food
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd time I have purchased the BodyMinder journal. It's a nice, compact book to keep track of everything you need on a daily basis. Easy to carry and just the right amount of information to keep you on track. Haven't seen another book like this so far!
customer_reviews.author: Shelley Nelson

customer_reviews.title: I love being able to quickly write up a workout
customer_reviews.text: I continue to use these books to log my workouts. I love being able to quickly write up a workout, log my reps and sets, and look back at what I've done. Great alternative if you hate typing things in your phone during a workout like I do.
customer_reviews.author: Perry

customer_reviews.title: The only fitness journal you’ll ever need
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best fitness journal on the market. It is designated for a 13 week fitness journey, but can be used for daily workouts. It has ample space to jot down all your stats and other relevant information. I constantly get asked by gym goers and people on social media where I got this journal from and who makes it. The people I’ve recommended it to have given me positive feedback as well. It’s a well made journal that is sturdy and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi Forrester

customer_reviews.title: I like the way this is detailed
customer_reviews.text: I bought this journal because I was tired of making my own. I like the way this is detailed. I feel this is helping me to exercise more and giving me the motivation as well. I'm a very organized person and this is perfect for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Excellent book. I have used these before and they have everything I need, a workout log for weights, aerobics and food log. What more can one ask for. I don't even think of using another log book as this one is the only format which best suits me needs. The pages are thick and the spiral notebook keeps the pages intact as opposed to cheaper type of log books out there.
customer_reviews.author: NYC Guy

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this workout journal
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this workout journal. I use it to write out all my lifting routines. This is my 6th one. I usually am able to write down 2 days worth of workouts on one page, so this journal will last you close to a year. Its so much fun to track the weights you've used, then to look back and see your progress and GAINS! I highly recommend this to anyone! PLUS, on the opposite page, you can track your meals if you want to (I never used that side, but, it would be helpful)
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Best fitness journal around!
customer_reviews.text: Best workout journal ever. I buy 4 per year as that is how many you will need if you want to write in them everyday. This is better than any app or other book I have found. LOVE IT. Please never ever stock making it. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea of this
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of this, but unfortunately there's not update foods for calorie counters and there's only a few pages for the weekly plan section-which amounts to 12 weeks, then you must buy another. I wish there was either a better journal or a better app!
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Great weightlifting journal
customer_reviews.text: This is a great fitness planner that is geared mainly toward those wanting to record weight training. It's simple and straight forward and easy to use. Much preferred over handwriting in a notebook.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel L. Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for anybody into health and fitness!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for tracking workouts and nutrition. There are pages in the front with common foods and calorie counts and also pages in the back to track all your fitness expenses, competition results, and personal records. I have used it for just over three months so far working out at least 4-5 days a week and there is still room for at least another few months of tracking. I recommend this book to anyone who wants an organized way to keep track of their workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material/price sticker not water soluble
customer_reviews.text: Tried to get a sticker (with price) off the back with first just water (wouldn’t come off) then a dash of a light soap and water and it dissolved the material as well as ran the color. I don’t know what material this thing is made of but it certainly isn’t something you want to take to the gym or to workout with; not going to give it to the person it was intended as a gift for. Very bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Works well with most workout regiments. Except maybe Arnold's.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quick and as described. I ordered two. Great little journal. Would work well for most anyone really active looking to keep track of your workout and it's progress.
customer_reviews.author: MRW

customer_reviews.title: I had this workout journal before and I loved it. I'm so glad to have found it ...
customer_reviews.text: I had this workout journal before and I loved it. I'm so glad to have found it again! This is the best out of all the others I've used. Not only is it comprehensive, it's easy and simple. I used to write up my own in a blank pad but it got so messy. When I found this it was set up just the way I would do it so it was natural to use!
customer_reviews.author: R.A.Sylveggio

customer_reviews.title: Awesome log book!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this log book for years and have repurchased multiple times. Keeping track of meals and workouts keeps you committed and motivated especially on days you don't feel like going in yet you have already invested time in planning and recording meals.
customer_reviews.author: C. Locke

customer_reviews.title: Great Fitness Journal!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how other fitness journals/diaries are, but I love this one. I organize my workout before I leave for the gym and take this journal with me so I can fill in what weight I am able to do when I get there. I can see my progress and use it to organize a better workout accordingly. I get compliments on it at the gym and everyone asking where I got it(I say AMAZON of coarse!). It also has a diet journal on the opposite page which is good for making sure you get enough/and or cut down on your calories, protein, carbs, etc..
customer_reviews.author: LEE4HIM

customer_reviews.title: Very Detailed
customer_reviews.text: This is the most detailed and comprehensive workout/nutrition book I have ever owned. It was a really nice surprise. It has a space for just about every aspect of your fitness plan. One side of the page covers workout, the other covers nutrition. You can record EVERYTHING in this book. It provides an exceptional resource for you to track your progress very well. I will check out other journal books from MemoryMinder Journals. This is a must have for people who train for marathons or competitions, but also a stupendous resource for those of us who just want to get in shape.
customer_reviews.author: Halo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for to keep track of my exersize "adventure".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Actually worth it
customer_reviews.text: I know you can get blank pieces of paper or design custom stuff on the computer, but I'm still kind of a book and pen guy for workout stuff. This one is very intuitive, and for me most of the categories I use, and there is space to customize if you want to keep track of a few different things not included here. I'll buy another one when this one is full.
customer_reviews.author: Jakkkke

customer_reviews.title: Detailed and vast
customer_reviews.text: Very clean and organized way to keep track if which part of the body you work out and your diet
customer_reviews.author: SingleMethod

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic! So many options and yet the layout keeps everything simple. I prefer it to other apps and journals. It has everything I want to keep track of and really does help me stay on track. I can see a repurchase in the future! I would recommend it to anyone looking for a great fitness and nutrition journal.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy H

customer_reviews.title: Was not a fan of the layout
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like this workout journal. I found it difficult to use because the layout wasn't one that I was able to follow with my own notetaking methods.
customer_reviews.author: J9

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Too much information. I just wanted for a workout log for the gym. The weight log area is great!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Great Jouranl/log
customer_reviews.text: I love this. This is my second book. My sister and I compare notes and motivate each other by showing off all our work. I helps me keep track of all my water and supplements so I don't for get.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Great record Keeper.
customer_reviews.text: I love the book, but it has a lot of wasted pages that I don't use. It serves my purpose and will buy it again until I find something better.
customer_reviews.author: nita

customer_reviews.title: A good help
customer_reviews.text: Every serious exercise buff (serious about getting trim, getting healthy or getting buff) knows that an accurate record is essential for not only charting your growth, but analyzing what is working and what's not working. An accurate journal is good motivation and encouragement -- and that's what this helps you do. The BodyMinder Journal is well laid out with enough opportunity for you to chart your cardio, or strength-training progress. It's compact enough that it fits in your gym bag, and the binder is large enough you can hide a pen or pencil inside the binder. It's well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael D. Kopp

customer_reviews.title: Great Format
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this book for about a week and I am impressed. At first, I was unsure about only 13 weeks worth of info, but now I would not mind buying three or four of these in a year because I can see where it would be worth it for personal improvement. I take it to the gym and there is plenty of room to write. Much thought has been put into the format of this book and it is easily adaptable as well. Worth buying and a great value on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a giveaway on my website. Haven't received feedback from winner. Looks good though!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lovelace

customer_reviews.title: Absolute favorite workout Journal!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many other workout journals but keep coming back to this one. I'm mostly through my third book. It is so simple and basic and has everything I need for lifting. It works pretty good for my HIIT workouts as well. I would recommend this to anyone who has more than five exercises that they are doing and More Than 3 reps.
customer_reviews.author: L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Best I've seen for workout tracking
customer_reviews.text: All you need to keep track of weight lifting, diet and cardio for 13 weeks. Has a food guide to help you keep track of calories, fats, carbs and protein intake. Best I've seen for workout tracking!
customer_reviews.author: James Bunch

customer_reviews.title: Great for gym and home workouts
customer_reviews.text: Love this!! I workout at the gym and at home. It's perfect! Very portable. Love the food section (wish there was a little more space). But good for what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great layout and does not miss much
customer_reviews.text: Great layout and does not miss much. Includes intake area, output, and exercises performed whether cardio or weights. Filled up my past one, and feels good to be able to refer back to where I was and have come to. For anyone looking for inspiration and willing to put in a little initial effort at exercise you will see increases at the flip of a page.
customer_reviews.author: Mckinley Robbins

customer_reviews.title: Can't complain
customer_reviews.text: I really like this book. It's gonna join m e on the journey. Seems well constructed not cheap and I appreciate the break down internally for the areas to write in the weights and work outs.
customer_reviews.author: Oscar Torres

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: All you need to log your workouts, food intake and some good reference material. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Coop

customer_reviews.title: I like this planner a lot
customer_reviews.text: I like this planner a lot. I bought 3 different types of fitness journals as I am new to this fitness journey of actually needing to keep track of what I am doing. I really do like this planner. I like all 3 of them but I am liking this more.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great book for logging
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was a little bigger for me personally, but other than that I like it, can’t go wrong towards the process to a healthier lifestyle.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: the perfect fitness journal
customer_reviews.text: i've been using the Body Minder work out and fitness journal for about a year. the journal is well organized with plenty of roon for recording work outs, calories burned, calories taken in and even breaks down the type of calories you consume. theri is an index of calories burned by specific exercises and sections for planning and recording your work outs and weight loss. If you are looking for a fitness journal I highly recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: William Lander

customer_reviews.title: Recommend for anyone that wants to be track workouts seriously
customer_reviews.text: I've had a few of these and they've really helped keep me on track. Recommend for anyone that wants to be track workouts seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Princess

customer_reviews.title: These are great! Helps keep up with every little thing we ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Helps keep up with every little thing we are doing each day! Well laid out and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Hesse

customer_reviews.title: A suggestion for the publisher
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second BodyMinder Workout Journal so obviously it meets my needs (although I do not need all the dietary pages). One suggestion is to include a place to store a pen. I'd be willing to pay more just for a little pen holder on the cover. The only negative is the awful price sticker on the back. It's impossible to get off, and if you try alcohol the color comes off. Please - do you really need a sticker on an item from Amazon??
customer_reviews.author: speckledfrog

customer_reviews.title: One of the best exercise logs around
customer_reviews.text: I've used another more expensive log book and this is by far one of the best. It is very comprehensive! I cannot think of any negatives because it has everything you need to be successful! It includes a Cardio Workout section with a checklist and a place to record minutes, pace, heart rate and calories burned. There is a section to write down you strength training information - weight, reps, and number of sets, a place to log "other exercise", and most importantly, a place to log your food and supplement intake. You are not locked into a date per page - as you exercise, you write in the date. This way you don't waste any pages.
customer_reviews.author: SVanabs

customer_reviews.title: but I love the layout
customer_reviews.text: It adds weight to your gym bag, but I love the layout. I do body weight exercises between weight-lifting sets. Most other training journals don't have enough lines for recording my workouts. I love the page layouts in this journal.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Fontcuberta

customer_reviews.title: Accountability
customer_reviews.text: Great little book that has pre-printed pages waiting for your input. Helps track what you've actually done today, this week, and over the year. Would recommend for all interested in tracking their efforts.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent workout log
customer_reviews.text: This book is very organized. It has a space for you to write each exercise, how many sets/reps you did, and what weight you used. It also has a cardio section with various cardio equipment already listed. Then you can enter how many minutes you did on the machine, at what pace, and how many calories you burned. This is an excellent way to keep up with your workouts , your improvements, and Weaknesses.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for body building, water intake, and food macros tracking
customer_reviews.text: I think this is one of the better logs, since you can track your exercises and food in one. I like it better than other versions. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: L Rdgz

customer_reviews.title: Love Body Minder
customer_reviews.text: I discovered these about a year ago at my gym. I absolutely love it! When my gym ran out of stock and was not replenishing in a timely manner Amazon saved the day, and for the same price (that's with shipping included, so actually cheaper). It is great tool for tracking workout and diet needs/goals. I carry it with me everytime I hit the gym. Can't imagine workout life without it!
customer_reviews.author: BBomb

customer_reviews.title: Love keeping goals, food, and workouts in one place.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this journal since the late 90's and love it. It is much easier for me to stay motivated, track my workouts, and meals in one place. Although there are numerous ways to electronically track; I still like the old pen & paper 😊.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great Bodybuilding Journal
customer_reviews.text: First off, I ordered this last night and I received it today (few minutes ago) Shipping was lighting fast from amazon prime. Was expected on Thursday. This workout and exercise journal is phenomenal, it's made to record your workouts, meals, snacks, everything you need to record your progress and intake of food. Highly recommended for setting a goal and recording your progress.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me on track!
customer_reviews.text: I really enjoy my new workout journal! It helps keep me on track and I've actually raised in strength. I tend to be a forgetful person, so I'm glad that I bought this book. I don't really use the diet side of the book though, but if I were counting my calories and making sure of it then I would! I've had this book for a few months now and can't imagine working out without it.
customer_reviews.author: Rebeccanne

customer_reviews.title: It’s up to You . Just do It❗️
customer_reviews.text: This workout journal has everything to get you on the road to a better body.
customer_reviews.author: Yankee fan

customer_reviews.title: The perfect fitness tracker!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this book is set up- 2 pages to keep track of fitness and where you're at. Enough rep sets for someone trying to lose weight with exercise. The only reason it has 4 stars is that I wish it didn't have the section for food- if you're using the diet minder journal, it makes it redundant- I tend to use the section for notes- but I think it could be better used for more room for cardio!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted and expected. If you're training ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I wanted and expected. If you're training for something and need a book to keep track of your sets, reps, weights, cardio, food, this is the book! I use my apps for macro calculations but I don't go to the gym without this notebook.
customer_reviews.author: CMB

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I was looking for -- a nicely bound, high-quality journal with spaces for details about nutrition information, cardio, lifting... I love this.
customer_reviews.author: Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great journal
customer_reviews.text: Other journals give so much space to diet that there is very little space left to log your workouts. This has a majority of the space for exercise but also has a space for dietary notes but they don't take over the book. I like in the back where you can keep track of events you've entered, your fitness expenses, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Mothers

customer_reviews.title: Love it, Love it, Love It
customer_reviews.text: This Journal is great, the only thing I wish it had was the time of day I rise & go to bed, I use the Time of Day in the Cardio Work out now. Also I want to track the time I take each meal. I use the space following Breakfast, Snack, etc.. Just a thought if/when you update the manual. I really like the comment section since I recently stopped smoking I am able to track my days there and the "Met today's goals?" is great.
customer_reviews.author: Sebring52

customer_reviews.title: LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought about 5 of these over the years and I LOVE them. Great for anyone who is into tracking food and workouts. I used this when I was preparing for my first figure competition and it is great to go back and see what I did to get there.
customer_reviews.author: SarJar

customer_reviews.title: Great log book!
customer_reviews.text: Well thought out planner! I've never logged much until now. This log book has helped tremendously! I highly recommend it to anyone to takes their health and fitness seriously.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Seeley

customer_reviews.title: Fitness Journal
customer_reviews.text: This is the best fitness journal I've used. It's convenient and thorough, and most importantly portable. I keep this journal with me most of the time. I can quickly write my meals down while sitting at work, and I can take it in the gym to record my workouts. The spiral binding makes it easier to carry than some of the other journals I've used. I just wish it had a space for planning workouts.
customer_reviews.author: T. Vann

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded My Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I've been working out on and off for a couple of years but have gotten very serious about exercise in the last few months. When a trainer at my gym recommended that I keep track of my work-outs, I began looking for a book that would help me do that. I tried a couple of other books but this one is by far the best. It helps me keep track of my diet, progress and even my work-out expenses! I would highly recommend this book because it is easy to use and very complete.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia de Zara

customer_reviews.title: great way to keep track of your diet and exercise ...
customer_reviews.text: great way to keep track of your diet and exercise habits. I myself found myself forgetting it when going to the gym.
customer_reviews.author: JonnyBuyerGuy

customer_reviews.title: This is the best product that I have purchased on Amazon thus far
customer_reviews.text: This is the best product that I have purchased on Amazon thus far! I use it to keep track of all of my diet logs, nutrition/meals consumed, and exercises performed. I highly recommend this product to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: best diet exercise journal!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing book for those who really like to track and record everything in your diet/ exercise. . I finished the entire book and transformed my body a good amount I feel having this helped alot! It gives pages to track weekly process . Goals. . Notes ect. . I will deff be buying again. . Excellent for a for lifestyle
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Only buy this if you really like organization. I love how it has so many details that are broken down to each category.
customer_reviews.author: GMelanie

customer_reviews.title: Great journal. Have gone through 5 of these
customer_reviews.text: Great journal. Have gone through 5 of these. Writing down all my exercises inspires me to finish my sessions. Also,since I have peripheal neuropathy, it gives a record to take to my neurologist.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Spalding

customer_reviews.title: worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for keeping track of meals and workouts. It's got info on a ton of food and even spots for things like how much money spent on workout equipment. Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: For the organized gym junkie
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge advocate for journaling your fitness journey. Previously I have bought notebooks from fitness websites, however this is my favorite I have ever purchased. It has more than enough room for all my workout routines, a problem I ran into with other books. There are spaces to record dietary information along with supplements and notes. It has been awesome to look back and see my progress the last couple months. I won't ever buy another workout journal!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Jiles

customer_reviews.title: I do not like the iPhone or iPad apps and writing it down ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd time purchasing this book. It is my fitness and diet diary. I do not like the iPhone or iPad apps and writing it down in this book is easy, and I can take it with me to my appointments with the Nutritionist.
customer_reviews.author: G Di Nola

customer_reviews.title: Great book but not recommended for people who don't know ...
customer_reviews.text: Great book but not recommended for people who don't know what they're doing. In conjunction with a personal trainer would be very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: The payout is great. It covers everything you could want
customer_reviews.text: The payout is great. It covers everything you could want, and is clean and visually appealing.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Barnhart

customer_reviews.title: Great log journal
customer_reviews.text: It is as a complete as a sports/bodybuilding/food & vitamin log book could be. A good improvement would be to make the paper/page's of a heavier stock paper.
customer_reviews.author: E. Payne Zook

customer_reviews.title: Nice inclusive journal.
customer_reviews.text: On my 2 nd journal. Easy to keep track of all my info
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome BodyMinder!
customer_reviews.text: I have searched for the right journal (for too long) that was made just for me. One that didn't have unnecessary info, useless pages or crazy spaces for inputs like "Five servings of Pasta/Bread?"... Finally I found the BodyMinder. It's simple, straight-forward and has exactly what I need! I'm on my third journal now and won't ever use a different one!
customer_reviews.author: M. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: My perfect workout journal
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing these workout journals for over 6 years and have not found another that meets my needs as this one does. I will continue to buy these journals as long as they are available.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: love that you can record each day and everything you ...
customer_reviews.text: Have had two of these now, love that you can record each day and everything you eat and do to work out.
customer_reviews.author: Mgills

customer_reviews.title: The journal provides a great journal/log of cardio and strength training activities including the ...
customer_reviews.text: The journal provides a great journal/log of cardio and strength training activities including the recording of your calorie/food intake which I think is an added bonus. However, the book arrived damaged on the corners giving the appearance that it had been dropped. Still usable.
customer_reviews.author: Dario

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this journal. I have bought multiples because I use them up, this is a great way to keep up with not only your food intake but your exercise routine as well. Along with any other little "notes" you want to place on these pages. I recommend this book (and tell them to purchase it on Amazon) almost everyday!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: The *BEST* Workout Log!
customer_reviews.text: I have used several different workout logs, but this is by far the most complete. Many logs do not contain enough space for a variety of cardio, nor do they have enough rows/columns to fully record a serious workout regime. This log does! Spaces are available to record vitamins & supplements, daily nutrition, hydration, etc. It is a very good buy for the money - in fact, I feel it is worth every penny spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Palmisano

customer_reviews.title: OMGeesh!
customer_reviews.text: This book Rocks awesomeness, especially if you are into health and are really watching it, this helps, lots! there is location for everything from food, calories, excerise, time! everything, it was perfect when i was dieting, with technology now a days most people stay clear from this but I loved it
customer_reviews.author: D!d! Br0wn

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment!
customer_reviews.text: Has helped me a lot in journaling my workouts. It's helped me in tracking my improvement and in memorizing my workouts. It makes working out more organized.. By tracking your improvements carefully, you will see how your are improving and will encourage you in achieving your daily/weekly goals, that will later affect your major goal. You will see how your strength and size is improving, and how your cardio, diet, and supplementation is affecting your performance and body-fat percentage.
customer_reviews.author: Salvador Nava

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for workouts. Lots of place to enter information. Tabs would be helpful to separate the different sections.
customer_reviews.author: ems1002

customer_reviews.title: Works for me!
customer_reviews.text: This book helps me to keep motivated with exercise and diet. I like it better than using an application because I place it in my kitchen near to the foods I eat and can look at the calorie count. I like that it gives me a synopsis of calories used in exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper of many things

customer_reviews.title: Excellent diet/fitness journal
customer_reviews.text: This has everything you could ever want to track on a two-page spread. You fill in the dates yourself so pages are never wasted. And it has a very sturdy binding and a discreet black, durable cover. I particularly like the section for medications and vitamins. No other fitness journal I've seen can even compare.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not alot of space to write for my taste but a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Wish it had a little more space for me to write but overall a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: journal
customer_reviews.text: I really like this book. It has everything I need to record down the necessary information. I've bought 3 of these books this year already and have had great results just being able to track not only my workouts to push myself harder but what I eat to know where I need to make a chage.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Extremely useful
customer_reviews.text: I have used this journal for many years, and have found it very useful indeed for staying in shape and keeping off the 40 lbs I lost over a four year time period eight years ago. I can't comment on the "DietMinder" or the "HealthMinder;" this is the only one I've used and I think the only one I need.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: This was a great price. Almost 1/2 of what it is sold ...
customer_reviews.text: This was a great price. Almost 1/2 of what it is sold for at B&N. It is comprehensive and is a great tool for managing a weight training program.
customer_reviews.author: Princess
